products.title: Gibson Custom Historic '56 Les Paul VOS Electric Guitar Gold Top
products.description: 1956 was the only full year in which the Les Paul model featured the powerful P-90 pickups and the adjustable ABR-1 bridge setup, a combination that allowed the Les Paul model to intonate, sustain, and thrill like never before. This Gibson Custom Shop '56 Reissue captures the look, feel and searing sound of an original 1956 Les Paul Goldtop in exhaustive detail, featuring all solid woods, vintage-accurate gold paint, authentic replica parts, Historic narrow/tall frets, and hot hide glue construction.

products.title: Fender Deluxe Nashville Telecaster Pau Ferro Fingerboard Fiesta Red
products.description: Straight from the studios of Music Row in the home of country music Nashville, TN comes the Deluxe Nashville Tele, a tonally versatile performer with a unique (for a Tele) three-pickup design. A distinctive entry into the Fender family, this Tele growls, snaps and screams with flexible tone that can match any song. With its original Fender style, customized switching and fast, smooth playing feel, this Tele is ready to command any stage from the local honky-tonk to the Grand Ole Opry.

products.title: Gibson 1957 SJ-200 Acoustic Guitar Antique Natural
products.description: The Gibson 1957 SJ-200 features the vintage vibe and feel from the era that give birth to some of the most prized Gibson acoustic instruments. This new Custom Shop 1957 SJ-200 offers details such as hand-selected maple for the back and sides, a headstock stinger and Gibson's Thermally Aged top for the full vintage effect.

products.title: Danelectro '59M NOS+ Electric Guitar - Black
products.description: Semi-hollowbody Electric Guitar with Spruce Body, Hardboard Top and Back, Maple Neck, Pau Ferro Fingerboard, and 2 NOS+ Single-coil Pickups - Black

products.title: Vox Custom AC30C2X 30W 2x12 Tube Guitar Combo Amp Black
products.description: The Vox AC30C2X amp makes use of 3 x 12AX7 preamp tubes and 4 x EL84 tubes to deliver 30 watts of power. The AC30C2X tube amp uses 2 - 12&ldquo Celestion Alnico Blues, and includes a switchable 8/16 ohm output jack for powering an external speaker cabinet when you need to speak with a little more authority; using this jack will mute the internal speakers. Additionally, a second extension speaker jack allows you to run an extra 16-ohm cabinet along with the internal speakers for a fuller sound.

products.title: Roland JC-120 Jazz Chorus Amp
products.description: For over 30 years, its sound quality and built-in effects have made the Roland JC-120 Jazz Chorus Amp the choice of pro players everywhere. It features 2 independent 60W amps, 2 input channels (Normal and Effects) with 3-band EQ for each, and a pair of 12&ldquo speakers. Effects include reverb, distortion, adjustable vibrato, and true stereo chorus. Distortion, reverb, and chorus are footswitchable.

products.title: Fender Vintage Reissue '65 Deluxe Reverb Guitar Combo Amp Black
products.description: The Fender '65 Deluxe Reverb Combo Amp has a sound big enough to cut through the muddiest mix, but it's small enough to turn up make the most of natural tube distortion in small clubs. This makes it the perfect studio amp, as well. It's a resurrection of a classic vintage tone monster. Crank up this faithful, U.S.-made reissue for your daily requirement of fat Fender tone. Delivers 22W through a 12&ldquo speaker. Features two channels (normal, vibrato), all-tube circuitry, tube vibrato, tube spring reverb, Blackface cosmetics and two-button footswitch to control the reverb and vibrato effects.

products.title: Dunlop Nylon Standard Guitar Pick .60 mm 1 Dozen
products.description: Dunlop Manufacturing produces many different types and sizes of plectra (or picks as they are also named) to suit the varied preferences of today's musicians. Dunlop's wide variety of gauges, shapes, sizes, and materials allows the player to select the exact guitar pick for his/her own particular style of playing. One dozen.

products.title: Mogami Gold Series Instrument Cable 10 ft.
products.description: Mogami Gold High-Definition represents the gold standard in instrument cables. Virtually every major recording facility in the world is wired with Mogami cable. Mogami is famous for unmatched accuracy, extremely low noise, and remarkable flexibility. Top engineers rave about the amazing clarity and silent background they get with Mogami cable. If accuracy in reproduction is your goal, Mogami Gold is the audio cable for you.
